###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlDTP_SetMCFont

###Description###
Sets the month calendar font

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiDateTimePicker.au3>
_GUICtrlDTP_SetMCFont($hWnd, $hFont[, $fRedraw = True])

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to the control
$hFont
	Handle to the font that will be set
$fRedraw
	Specifies whether the control should be redrawn immediately
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
None.

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlDTP_GetMCFont
